<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1035</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Famous Authors Profile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Berühmtes Autoren Profil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Profil Célèbre d'Auteurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Perfil Famoso Dos Autores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Profilo Famoso Degli Autori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάσημο σχεδιάγραμμα συντακτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Perfil Famoso De los Autores</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this activity the learners will be introduced to famous authors and different types, styles and themes of literature. They will investigate historical and cultural influences on the author's work.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">historical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cultural influence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">famous authors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">poem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">American Civil War</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Aktivität werden die Anfänger zu den 
berühmten Autoren und unterschiedliche Typen, Arten und Themen der 
Literatur eingeführt. Sie forschen die historischen und 
kulturellen Einflüsse auf die Arbeit des Autors nach.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette activité les étudiants seront 
présentés aux auteurs célèbres et les différents types, modèles 
et thèmes de littérature. Ils étudieront des influences 
historiques et culturelles sur le travail de l'auteur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta atividade os learners serão introduzidos 
aos autores famosos e tipos, estilos e temas diferentes da literatura.
Investigarão influências históricas e cultural no trabalho do
autor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa attività i principianti saranno 
introdotti agli autori famosi e tipi, stili e temi differenti di 
letterature. Studieranno le influenze storiche e culturali sul 
lavoro dell'autore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι θα εισαχθούν 
στους διάσημους συντάκτες και τους διαφορετικούς τύπους, τις 
μορφές και τα θέματα της λογοτεχνίας. Θα ερευνήσουν τις 
ιστορικές και πολιτιστικές επιρροές στην εργασία του συντάκτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta actividad introducirán a los 
principiantes a los autores famosos y los diversos tipos, estilos y 
temas de la literatura. Investigarán influencias históricas y 
culturales en el trabajo del autor.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">historisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kultureller Einfluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">berühmte Autoren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gedicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Amerikanischer Bürgerkrieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">historique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">influence culturelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">auteurs célèbres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poésie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guerre Civile Américaine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">histórico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">influência cultural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">autores famosos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guerra Civil Americana</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">influenza culturale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
